pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geant simulates the passage of subatomic particles through matter, for instance, particle detectors. Geant 3 simulations are performed by linking Fortran code supplied by the user with the Geant libraries, then running the resulting executable. This package includes gxint, the script used to perform this linking step. Geant 4 is a complete rewrite in C++ with addition of other modern features and detectors.
